entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Elgin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.5°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries early this morning then 40 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 50 km/h gusting to 70 this morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming east 20 before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2. POP 60%
